attributes.action: Give 16-18 Year Olds Their Own EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
At 16, we can:

    Get married
    Consent to sexual activity
    Work
    Get a National Insurance number
    Join a trade union
    Join the Armed Forces with parental consent
    Change name
    Leave home
    Buy premium bonds
    Apply for a passport

Surely this implies we have the intelligence and maturity to vote. 

If in any doubt, please watch the following video and I think you'll agree they definitely deserve their say.

https://twitter.com/Channel4News/status/746764293849309184
attributes.background:
It seems very unfair that our elderly population gets to vote at any age and irrespective of their mental health (Dementia, Alzheimer's etc) yet the 16 to 18 year olds, whose future this decision will shape, are deemed unfit to do so.

Lets give them their own referendum and update the results.
